amendment.description: To require a report on the costs incurred by the Department of Defense in implementing or supporting resolutions of the United Nations Security Council.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1375 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1375 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S8631-8632; text: CR S8631-8632) To require a report on the costs incurred by the Department of Defense in implementing or supporting resolutions of the United Nations Security Council.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1375 proposed by Senator Ensign.
